page.title: 04 EDUCATION (cont)
page.content: WILLIAM ELLIS STATE SCHOOL TEACHER : There are 820 students at William Ellis state school and 1\4 of the students are of ethenic minorities.23 languages other than English are spoken.The majority speak fluent English. Pupils are taught in mixed ability classes in the first three years. In the 4th and 5th years pupils are put into ability sets for some subjects. How are the pupils chosen for the school? The primary schools carry out tests and give pupils a grading of 1,2 or 3. The school has to take 25% with grade 1 classification,50% of grade 2 and 25% grade 3.Students have to live in the area close to the school(catchment area)unless they have a brother already
